Overflow Column Layouts

These layouts demonstrate overflow scrolling with the columns() layout mode.
Each layout shows both regular overflow and preview modes.

1 Column

Columns 1 - Regular Overflow

1-column layout (default) <lay-out lg="columns(1)" overflow>

Columns 1 - Preview Mode

1-column layout (default) with preview of next items <lay-out lg="columns(1)" overflow="preview">

2 Columns

Columns 2 - Regular Overflow

2-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out lg="columns(2)" overflow>

Columns 2 - Preview Mode

2-column layout with equal width columns with preview of next items <lay-out lg="columns(2)" overflow="preview">

3 Columns

Columns 3 - Regular Overflow

3-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out lg="columns(3)" overflow>

Columns 3 - Preview Mode

3-column layout with equal width columns with preview of next items <lay-out lg="columns(3)" overflow="preview">

4 Columns

Columns 4 - Regular Overflow

4-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out lg="columns(4)" overflow>

Columns 4 - Preview Mode

4-column layout with equal width columns with preview of next items <lay-out lg="columns(4)" overflow="preview">

5 Columns

Columns 5 - Regular Overflow

5-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out lg="columns(5)" overflow>

Columns 5 - Preview Mode

5-column layout with equal width columns with preview of next items <lay-out lg="columns(5)" overflow="preview">

6 Columns

Columns 6 - Regular Overflow

6-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out lg="columns(6)" overflow>

Columns 6 - Preview Mode

6-column layout with equal width columns with preview of next items <lay-out lg="columns(6)" overflow="preview">
